AI_CHAT_KEY.description: API key for authentication with the chat service provider.
AI_CHAT_KEY.title: AI_CHAT_KEY

AI_CHAT_NAME.description: The name of the AI chat provider to use, like 'OpenAI' or 'PyroPrompts'.
AI_CHAT_NAME.title: AI_CHAT_NAME

AI_CHAT_MODEL.description: Specifies which model to be used for the chat service, e.g., 'gpt-4o'.
AI_CHAT_MODEL.title: AI_CHAT_MODEL

AI_CHAT_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the API service of the chat provider.
AI_CHAT_BASE_URL.title: AI_CHAT_BASE_URL
